lines.text: Lot of wonderful things written into our constitution that were meant for honest decent citizens. I resent the fact that it can be used and abused by the very people who want to destroy it.
Hey we better get outta here. I'll start talking politics.
He just is a neuter in the personality.
I've had a belly full of this East Texas cotton-chopping jerk.
Nah, I'm from the country club set. That chopping cotton's for white trash and niggers!
[McLain punches Poke and a fight ensues]
